content: this text is about a legal case between two parties referred to as sg and ag sg has taken action against ag demanding the division of their joint assets which include a property the court has ordered the sale of the property with the proceeds to be divided equally between the parties the parties are responsible for the procedural costs of the case the judgment can be appealed within 30 days either through a court hearing or in writing the court will determine the distribution of procedural costs the claimant filed a lawsuit seeking the division of joint assets and requested that the defendant bear the costs of the proceedings the court examined the claim and found it to be wellfounded the court ruled that the joint assets should be divided by selling the property through a public auction and dividing the proceeds equally the court also ruled that the parties are responsible for paying the procedural costs and the court will determine the amount if a party disagrees with the courts decision on the procedural costs they can file an appeal but they must bear the costs of the appeal if it exceeds 200 euros
